SKILL_005.name: Black Belt Meal (Lo)
SKILL_005.explain: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

SKILL_006.name: Black Belt Meal (Hi)
SKILL_006.explain: Greatly reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

SKILL_007.name: Tumbler Meal (Lo)
SKILL_007.explain: Slightly extends the invulnerability period when evading.

SKILL_008.name: Tumbler Meal (Hi)
SKILL_008.explain: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

SKILL_009.name: Moxie Meal (Lo)
SKILL_009.explain: Prevents fainting one time when damage taken exceeds your remaining health.

SKILL_010.name: Moxie Meal (Hi)
SKILL_010.explain: Prevents fainting one time and heals you when damage taken exceeds your remaining health.

SKILL_011.name: Caprice Meal (Lo)
SKILL_011.explain: Repeatedly activates a temporary attack boost at random intervals.

SKILL_012.name: Caprice Meal (Hi)
SKILL_012.explain: Repeatedly activates a large temporary attack boost at random intervals.

SKILL_013.name: Immunizer Meal
SKILL_013.explain: Lessens the effects of various ailments.

SKILL_014.name: Medic Meal
SKILL_014.explain: Increases the amount of health recovered when healing.

SKILL_015.name: Sizzling Meal
SKILL_015.explain: Negates the effects of hot or cold climates and increases defense while in such areas.

SKILL_017.name: Specialist Meal
SKILL_017.explain: Increases the potency of abnormal status attacks.

SKILL_018.name: Gatherer Meal
SKILL_018.explain: Sometimes increases the number of resources per gather of bones, ore, and other gatherable items.
